alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harrison and southern Hancock Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stennis Space Center, or 9 miles west of Waveland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 5 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
